statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, timestamp, camera_data FROM sensor_data WHERE id = 2;
SELECT id, lidar_data FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE id IN (3, 4);
SELECT timestamp, camera_data FROM sensor_data WHERE camera_data->>'event' = 'motion';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, camera_data ->> 'resolution' AS camera_resolution FROM sensor_data WHERE camera_data -> 'type' = 'front';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE camera_data -> 'resolution' = '1080p' AND lidar_data @> '{"range": [10, 20]}' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, timestamp, jsonb_array_elements_text(camera_data -> 'tags') AS tag FROM sensor_data WHERE camera_data -> 'tags' @> '["outdoor", "sunny"]';
SELECT * FROM Cameras;
SELECT camera_id, location FROM Cameras ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT location, resolution FROM Cameras WHERE resolution LIKE 'HD%';
SELECT camera_id, location, fov FROM Cameras WHERE fov > 90;
SELECT * FROM LidarSensors ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM Cameras WHERE resolution='4K' ORDER BY location DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT location, fov FROM Cameras WHERE fov > 90 ORDER BY fov ASC
SELECT sensor_id, location, range FROM LidarSensors WHERE accuracy >= 0.9 AND range < 1000
SELECT AVG(fov) AS avg_fov FROM Cameras
SELECT location, resolution, fov FROM Cameras WHERE resolution IN ('1080p', '4K') ORDER BY location
SELECT * FROM cameras;
SELECT image_url, timestamp FROM cameras WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, camera_id, timestamp FROM cameras ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM lidar_sensors WHERE distance > 100;
SELECT detection_id, detected_object FROM object_detection ORDER BY detection_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM cameras ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT camera_id, timestamp, image_url FROM cameras WHERE id = 5;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(distance) AS max_distance FROM lidar_sensors GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT DISTINCT detected_object FROM object_detection WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM cameras JOIN object_detection ON cameras.camera_id = object_detection.detection_id;
SELECT * FROM Cameras WHERE location='Room A';
SELECT camera_id, resolution FROM Cameras WHERE framerate > 30;
SELECT location, framerate FROM Cameras ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM LidarSensors WHERE accuracy >= 0.9 ORDER BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, object_distance FROM LidarData WHERE object_height < 2.0;
SELECT * FROM Cameras WHERE location = 'Room 1' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM LidarSensors WHERE accuracy > 0.9 AND location LIKE '%garage%' ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT location, resolution, framerate FROM Cameras WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY resolution ASC, framerate DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CameraData WHERE object_type = 'person' GROUP BY camera_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;
SELECT location, accuracy, timestamp FROM LidarSensors WHERE location = 'Main Hall' OR location = 'Meeting Room' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM Cameras;
SELECT camera_id, location, resolution FROM Cameras WHERE resolution = '1080p';
SELECT object_type, confidence, timestamp FROM ObjectDetectionData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT make, model, year FROM Cars WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM DetectedObjects WHERE object_class = 'car' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM Cameras WHERE resolution = '1080p';
SELECT location, resolution FROM Cameras WHERE location = 'Entrance';
SELECT DISTINCT object_type FROM ObjectDetectionData ORDER BY object_type DESC;
SELECT detection_id, object_class, bounding_box FROM DetectedObjects JOIN ObjectDetectionData ON DetectedObjects.detection_id = ObjectDetectionData.detection_id WHERE confidence > 0.8;
SELECT car_id, make, model, year FROM Cars ORDER BY year DESC, make ASC;
